markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadowy Disguise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2509) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fetchling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=300" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 87 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

You wrap yourself in shadow to change your appearance. You can cast [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) as a 1st-level occult innate spell once per day. This spell gains the [shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143) trait.
name: Shadowy Disguise
